Oblitertron/Oinker/Punch/Zergling:




Oblitertron ignored the shots that dug into his armor, there not 
being many that round.  He fired off three laser bolts from his large 
laser rifle at the Ark, stepping towards it quickly.

-----

Shots slammed Zergling back into the wall he had previously been shot 
into, a crack in his chest visible.

---

Punch sidestepped, a blast digging into his left side.  He fired off 
two bolts from his laser pistol at Habiuskon.

---

Oinker, tracking his fellow members, ran into the engine room, weapon 
ready.  If he saved his comrades, Zardus would reward him nicely.

"Not so fast yuh Maxi." he fired off two bolts from his rifle at 
Habiskun's back.
